channel.title: projects on Carlos Ramos
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Carlos Ramos

item.title: Procedural Earthbending
item.description: A game that explores the mechanics of VR by implementing a clever algorithm for procedural earhbending.

item.title: CO2 Emission Simulator
item.description: Given a simulated vahicle traffic on different cities, this app allows you to visualize the levels of CO2 emmited.and configuration files.

item.title: OSBox
item.description: OSBox is the solution for managing the software stack in any operating system. It automatically synchronizes, manages dependencies and configuration files.

item.title: WordPress Calypso
item.description: Implementation, refactoring and fixing features of the new React-based admin of Wordpress.

item.title: Genesis
item.description: A tool for automating the structure, documentation and tracking of a new software project.

item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: My personal system configuration and automation system. (btw i use arch)
